Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, let the festivities for the <RED>New
Year's Eve</RED> festival commence.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's still time until the New Year.
I'll have some noodles ready for you.
It'll be cold, so eat lots to warm up.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's almost time for the New Year's Eve
countdown, everyone! Hurry up and finish
your noodles.

Nearly time for the countdown. I'd
rather do it with everyone, so I'll go
ask around and see who wants to join.

I asked around but only one person came.
I guess it'll be a New Year's Eve with
just two people this time around.

<BLUE><MOJI0> people</BLUE> gathered for the
New Year's Eve countdown!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right! It's time for the New Year's
Eve countdown! Let's start at 5! Ready?!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
5...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
4...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
3...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
2...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
1...
Happy New Year!!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy New Year, everyone! I hope this
town will be just as happy and fun this
year, too!
<PAGE>
It'll be a great year for us all!

It's the beginning of a new year! Let's
all join together and make this another
great year.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Has it already been a year? Time sure
flies.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's got you lookin' so down, dear?
Did something happen?

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I'm not sad or anything. It's just
that this year has been so much fun that
I don't want the year to end.

<FACE_KOSABURO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
What? S'that all? We have a whole new
exciting year ahead of us! Let's welcome
it with open arms!

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ho ho, you know, you're right. Let's
make this the loudest New Year's Eve
countdown yet.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mom...

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, Yuri? Are your noodles too
hot for you to eat?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's not that. I just... I just want to
thank you. You helped me so much over
the past year.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, Yuri... I was wondering what you
were going to say...
<PAGE>
There's no need to thank me. As long as
you're happy, I'm happy.
<PAGE>
Now eat your noodles. They won't taste
good if they get soggy.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yeah... Thanks, Mom.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Say, Mom. Since we're doing the New
Year's Eve countdown, why don't we shoot
off some fireworks?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wish we could, but there's so much to
prepare. Towards the end of the year, 
all families are just so busy.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Then I'll help out next year! But for
now, let's prepare some fireworks for
everyone!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, geez. What are you saying? You're
still too young to be handling
fireworks!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But then again, you do have
grit. I'll give you that, Toni.
<PAGE>
And if you want to help out that much,
you can start helping me at work
tomorrow.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What!? But I want to do fireworks!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Blegh... I should've kept my
big mouth shut.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well now, this year sure blew past us
really fast.
<PAGE>
Niko, how was the past year for you?

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was fun! I played lots with Toni and
I got to eat lots of great stuff!
<PAGE>
And these noodles are great! I wonder
what they use for the soup stock.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Do you think about anything else besides
food? You really should try to do better
in school.

<FACE_NARUKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Can I help it? Whenever I ask you for
help on my schoolwork, you always say
you don't know.

<FACE_HOSSAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
W-Well, that's because... Hm...
<PAGE>
Sorry, Niko. Daddy will try harder to
help you with your studies starting
next year.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Phew... These noodles always taste
better when you enjoy it together with
everyone.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>It's so delicious! I just love how this
town has so many food-related festivals
like the Crop Festival!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're right! It's absolutely wonderful
for epicures like you and me!
<PAGE>
Oh, yes! I almost forgot. I prepared
some red bean soup. I'll bring everyone
some later.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yay! I was just craving something sweet!
<PAGE>
That's great, Clement! I'll help you
deliver it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Let me help! Clement's red bean soup... 
I love how it always has just the right
amount of sweetness. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you! That'll be a great help!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>But! You better not steal
a few bites!
It is the New Year after all!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I-I would never do that! I think... 
Right, Felicity?
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA>Y-Yes! Oh, jeez, Clement, you can be so
rude!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>Are you sure? I'm counting on you...

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hmm... *Yawn*
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Oh, Hina? Getting sleepy? It's almost
time for the New Year's Eve countdown, 
so try and stay awake.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>That's why I told you to nap today.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
But... I couldn't sleep because I was so
excited.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>That's what kids do, right? It won't
happen when she get's older.

<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh? I wonder who it was that was snoring
loudly the whole day? Eh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>O-Oh, come on, Camellia, Don't say that
in front of Hina.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Daddy, you were sleeping! You big liar!
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>H-Hina! Don't say that. You'll make me
cry.

<FACE_HINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hmph! I don't care! Maybe you deserve 
it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMIRIYA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Ha ha. Looks like Hina isn't sleepy
anymore.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The new year is almost upon us. Have you
made a resolution for next year, Klaus?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well... As a doctor, I know I should be
committed to lifelong learning.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even a doctor of your caliber thinks
about that? I guess I should try to be
more like you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Both of us have learned much over this
past year.
<PAGE>
In order to make good use of our new
knowledge, we must continue to learn
more in the following years.
<PAGE>
That is how we, as people, grow and
mature. That is the one truth I have
learned in my life.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I am grateful for that wonderful
lesson. I will endeavor to keep your
words in mind.

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
By the way, Michelle, thank you very
much for the delightful magic shows this
year.
<PAGE>
I always love your magic tricks, and
I'll be looking forward to what you come
up with next year.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Really? That's so wonderful coming 
coming from you, Olivia!
<PAGE>
I always love the tea you serve, too!
I'll be looking forward to trying the
new things you add to the menu! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Heh heh, it is an honor. Thank you.
<PAGE>
Oh, I know. What if you did a magic
show at my shop, then?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sure! I would love to!
<PAGE>
Oh, but in exchange...can you tell me
about how you manage to stay so
beautiful? <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, my. Well, It's a trade secret, you
know. But I will consider it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
By the way, you always hole up in your
room, Sandra. How's your research
coming along?

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, be quiet, kid! I don't have to tell
you anything about my research!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
K-Kid? I didn't expect to be treated
like a child at my age.

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha ha ha! I've lived through more hard
times than you could even dream of!
<PAGE>
You're still just a kid in my eyes!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, brother. I suppose my next year's
goal is to grow out of being that "kid."
Hmmm, It's going to be tough...

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's nearly the new year. I wonder if
the people in our home country are 
awaiting the new year as we are now?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I imagine they are. 
<PAGE>
I'm sure there is quite a commotion at
the palace as they prepare for the
new year's ceremony.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
That ceremony was a huge pain. I think
I'm done with that for the time being.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But it does bring back some good
memories, too. It can be so strange.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Indeed. Perhaps that is what they call
homesickness.
<PAGE>
Master Amir, let us wish for their
happiness from this faraway land.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're right, Sanjay. May our home
country be blessed with glory.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ack! Hot! I ate too quickly and burned
my tongue.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You never change. You burned yourself
the exact same way when you were little.
Don't you ever learn?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Why do you always remember those things?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But you know what, Allen? There's lots
of ways you haven't changed either.
<PAGE>
No matter how old you get, you're always
the same. I think that's good in some
ways.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, I guess.
<PAGE>
Thanks to that, I can continue to tease
you for a long time to come.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Wait, no! I take that back!
<PAGE>
Next year, you'll see how much I can
change!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Hey, Neil. You still have some food
left in your noodle bowl. You ought to
finish everything.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Leave me alone. I hate it when people
tell me what to do.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't really help it. We old timers
don't have much else to do but
worry about you youngins. 
<PAGE>
Besides, I've known you for so long that
it just comes naturally.
<PAGE>
I'm thankful how you stayed in the town
until <MYNAME> came.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Geez. Stop thanking me.
<PAGE>
It's the young people's job to take
care of the old ones. I'm not doing it
because I have a choice.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha ha! Right... Hope the next year
will be a great one, Neil.

It's quite late. It's about time to
go to bed.
